column2: A note containingdescription of technical details and/or other characteristics of the data collection (such as unique authoring, dissemination, or processing information) that cannot be recorded in the other metadata fields but constitute important information for the user.

Collection notes should include any information that does not fit anywhere else in the metadata. This includes but is not limited to information about unique aspects of the way the data was processed, discrepancies between the metadata and study documentation, information about the research team, links to external websites, information about related studies, or series-specific notes. The collection notes field is something of a catch-all.
